San_Leandro.Doolittle Maintenance and Storage Facili: The Doolittle Maintenance and Storage Facility (also known as the Wheelhouse) is the operations management center for the BART Coliseum–Oakland International Airport line. The building is used for storage and maintenance of the Cable Liner cars, and is also the powerhouse for the system’s 12-foot (3.7 m) drive wheels. It was initially planned to also be a passenger station; the station was cut due to lack of funding, but may be added in the future.
